schemeName: Junior Research Fellowship in Science, Humanities and Social Sciences
objective: To provide financial assistance to NET/JRF-qualified candidates to undertake advanced studies and research leading to M.Phil./Ph.D. degree in Humanities, Social Sciences (including Languages), and Sciences.

eligibility.registrationCondition: Registration for M.Phil/Ph.D. must be done within two years from the date of result declaration or award letter or joining the fellowship.

tenure.condition: Whichever is earlier – 5 years or submission of thesis

schemeName: Savitribai Jyotirao Phule Fellowship For Single Girl Child
objective: To provide fellowship for pursuing research work leading to award of Ph.D. degree.
To support higher education of single girl child in Social Sciences.
To recognize the value of observance of small family norm.
To promote the concept of single girl child in society.
To empower and promote single girl children through higher education.
slots: Decided annually based on eligible applications received online

tenure.condition: Whichever is earlier – submission of Ph.D. thesis or 5 years
